colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RDO RJE SDOR MO'I GZUNGS MDOR DANG 'BREL ZHING YI DAM BSRUNG MA'I 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS PHYIR BZLOG BYED TSUL PHAS RGOL 'JOMS PA'I RDO RJE ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HAL HA GA-YON RU'I PHYOGS TA'I CHING DZA SAG MGON DKAR SKYABS KYI BLA MA MKHYEN PA'I DPYOD LDAN AA CHI THU BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS DANG, DAD LDAN AUS DZING THAS DZI 'CHI MED RNAM GNYIS KYIS BSKUL ZHING, LHAG PAR BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG MI RJE DAM PA AER TE NI AA HAS DZA SAG RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I RIM 'GROR NYER MKHO'I BSKUL MA BYUNG ZHING, ,'DI 'DRA'I LAG LEN YOD MED MTHONG THOS SU MA GYUR CING GDUGS DKAR GYI GZUNGS MDO'I SGO NAS ZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING DANG GSAR BRTZOM MANG DU BSZHUGS PA DE BZHIN, 'DIR YANG DE'I RIG 'DRA RE SBYOR RUNG 'AM SNYAMS, 'ON KYANG GZUNGS MDO KHO NA LA BSTEN NAS BYAR RUNG MI RUNG @008B THE TSOM MCHIS KYANG, RANG GI YI DAM CHOS SKYONG GI 'PHRIN LAS KYI SGO NAS GZUNGS MDO DANG BSTUN PA'I RIG 'DRA'I SBYOR RUNG BAR SEMS SHING, MO BYA MKHAN GYI KUNG BRTAN DU 'KHRUL BA'I DON GNYER CAN MANG DU MCHIS KYANG LAG LEN RNAM DAG BYED MKHAN SU YANG MA MTHONG, 'JAM DPAL RDO RJE'I MDZAD CES KHA GA-YAR BA'I RDO RJE SDER MO'I BZLOG BSGYUR DU GRAGS PA 'DI NI MDOS GLUD KYI NGAG 'DON LA BZLOG TSIG KHUNG MED SNA TSOGS SHIG BRIS 'DUG PA MDOS GTOR GYI RNAM DBYE MI SHIS PA'I RANG BZHIN LAS MA 'DAS PA LA, GZUNGS MDO RANG GI GZHUNG DON DANG MTHUN CING DPYAD BZOD PA'I KHUL DU BYAS TE RANG GZHAN LA PHAN SEMS KYIS, KUN NAS BLANGS TE, ^SNGAGS 'CHANG DGE 'DUN SENG GE RNAM SNANG RDO RJES RANG GI SDE GNAS LHA BSRUNG DGYES DGA' TSAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
